short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bitcoin Miner is a simple and fun game about Bitcoin virtual currency that you can play right on your chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HOW TO PLAY
1)take the GPU and place it on the table by left clicking
2)earn enough cryptocurrency to buy a new GPU
3)repeat and get enough cryptocurrency to sell them for money
in the Trading Centre
4)trade in enough cryptocurrency for a new studio for you to work
5)GPUs have different mining speed and crypto for each cryptocurrency.
Heres a page if you want to know more about the GPUs crypto each mined (Next update)
IMPORTANT:every studio has different GPU, Studio and trading prices
